abstract: Polish priest Rev Wojciech Gil offers to serve seven-year jail sentence for crimes including moslestation of young boys in Poland and Dominican Republic; under Polish law a defendant can offer to serve prison time for some crimes without admitting to guilt.
lead_paragraph: A Polish priest accused of sexually abusing minors in Poland and in the Dominican Republic offered to serve a seven-year jail sentence as his trial opened on Friday, according to a spokeswoman for a regional court in Warsaw.

headline.print_headline: Europe; Poland: Priest’s Abuse Trial Opens
